name: dewizeio
0:
”Alexa, Turn on the light”
”Alexa, set the fan speed to 1”
”Alexa, set the fan speed to minimum”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
dewize.io Skill allows you to control the home appliances with a voice by saying "Alexa, Turn on the kitchen light".
You can also control the fan speed by saying "Alexa, Set Fan speed to 2" where the name of the device is Fan.

Before getting started, Make sure your device is configured with dewize.io, and then you can enable the dewize.io Skill from Alexa App and you will be redirected to login with the same email id and password you used to configure the device.

On your Alexa app, You can search for dewize.io to find your respective skill and need to link your account by enabling it to control your home appliances using Alexa.

The Compatible dewize.io are as follows:
1. One Node Smart Switch.
2. Two Node Smart Switch
3. Four Node Smart Switch.
4. Four Node Smart Switch with Fan.


Some examples are as follows :

Alexa, Turn on Smart Bulb
Alexa, Turn off the light
Alexa, set the fan speed to 4
Alexa, set the fan speed to 3
Alexa, set the fan speed to maximum
Alexa, set the fan speed to minimum
